name: Find Monster
description:
Let's find the right monster to get the highest score

1. First, you can read how to play by clicking the How To Play button in home 

2. Give attention for certain monster that you must find in each level cause its certain monster can increase your score point

3. Every 5 level you will reach to bonus level, which is you must to find the correct pair of monster and if you can pass this bonus level, you will continue your playing journey.
